title: Trump's AI Czar David Sacks Supports President's 'One Rulebook' For The Technology, Warns 50-State Regulatory Patchwork Could Cripple US
description: Venture capitalist David Sacks is backing President Donald Trump's push for a unified national framework to regulate artificial intelligence, warning that fragmented state laws could risk undermining U.S. innovation and global competitiveness.
content:
Venture capitalist David Sacks is backing President Donald Trump’s push for a “one rulebook” for Artificial Intelligence, warning that fragmented state laws could undermine U.S. innovation and global competitiveness.

title: AI browsers aren’t smart enough yet to take over the Internet
description: When OpenAI unveiled an artificial intelligence-based browser in October, Alphabet Inc investors expressed concern about what it would mean for Google Chrome, the ubiquitous gateway to the Internet used by billions globally.
content:

title: Trump to allow Nvidia to sell H200 AI chips to China
description: President Donald Trump announced Monday he will allow Nvidia to sell some Artificial Intelligence chips to China, if the United States gets a 25% cut.

title: Google says first AI glasses with Gemini will arrive in 2026
